input.sentences: the entrance to the facility was empty | you would think no one visited the place .
we were offered a refreshing beverage when we got inside .
as we took a look around i noticed that there was an aquarium that even had seahorses .
there was also strange creatures that i had never seen before .
when our meals arrived i knew we were in for a surprising meal .
output.sentences: His car drove through the facility entrance as looking forward to visiting her.
He made is way inside, welcoming the refreshing air that was a nice reprieve from the dry August heat.
The first thing he noticed upon entering the building was a sea horse bluer than the sky from outside, swimming around in the center of an aquarium.
His eyes noticed the beauty first and then the ugly: the strange creature resembling his heart.
Not wanting to spoil his appetite he continued forward into the restaurant, only focusing on the beauty that awaited him seated at a table in the center of the room.
